result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Isaac W. Greyhair

defendant.name: Greyhair, Isaac W.
defendant.address: 2842 Little Pines Road P.O. Box 204, Lac du Flambeau, WI 54538

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on November 29, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Isaac W. Greyhair in court.  Attorney Courtney Christine Jolin in court for Isaac W. Greyhair.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Warrant quashed. PTC Scheduled.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 29, 2022 at 09:00 am.

12:40 PM Defendant Isaac W. Greyhair not in court.  Attorney Courtney Christine Jolin in court for Isaac W. Greyhair.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls 22CF101 and 20CF236.  Attorney Jolin is unaware where her client is at. State asks for warrant. Defense asks for a lower cash bond.  Court authorizes BODY ONLY warrant in both cases.

2:08 PM Defendant Isaac W. Greyhair in court, in custody.  Attorney Courtney Christine Jolin in court for Isaac W. Greyhair.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin.  Waiver of preliminary hearing.  Rights given.  Court finds defendant is making a knowing and voluntary waiver of right to preliminary examination.  Court finds probable cause.  Bound over for arraignment on an information.  State to e-file information in court and provides copies to defense.  Defense waives formal reading of information.  Not guilty pleas entered by court. Pretrial conference scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 11:00 am. Bond continued.
Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on August 10, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
11:06 AM Defendant Isaac W. Greyhair in court, in custody. Attorney Courtney Jolin appeared in person.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Time period extended due to judge conflict and judge retirement. Bond continued.
Adjourned for status proceedings scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status hearing on July 25, 2022 at 11:00 am.

3:19 PM Defendant Isaac W. Greyhair appeared by video, in custody.  ADA Dennis Brown in court for State of Wisconsin. 117 attempts have been made to appoint a public defender. Court amends bond on this case to $750.00 cash No contact with (R.W.)
Status hearing scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report - 117 contacts

11:04 PM Defendant Isaac W. Greyhair in court, in custody.  ADA Dennis Brown, in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant has not been able to retain public defender.  Bond Continued.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report - 8 Contacts
Preliminary hearing on June 30, 2022 at 11:00 am.

11:02 AM Defendant Isaac W. Greyhair in court, in custody, without counsel.   ADA Dennis Brown appears in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant confirms receipt of complaint. Defendant is eligible for public defender. Court reviews motion to modify bond. Denied by court.  Bond continued.  Court advises State to get date calendared on Judge O'Melia's calendar.

1:09 PM Defendant Isaac W. Greyhair in court, in custody.  Attorney Karl Peter Hayes in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant appears by video from the Vilas County Jail.  Public Defender Courtney Jolin specially  appears via video. DA Karl Hayes appears for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is PD eligible however there is a conflict and private bar will be appointed.  Court makes notice of conflict and an application for judicial assignment will be completed by the Clerk.  Defendant confirms receipt of criminal complaint.  Bond set at $1000.00 cash with condition of  No Contact with R.W. (1972).  Bond Form.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 10:30 am.
